member.name: T:TokenAuth.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TokenAuth.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TokenAuth.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:TokenAuth.UserToken.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long

member.name: M:TokenAuth.UserToken.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Can be either SHA1 or MD5
